message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this unique opportunity for $1500000. We understand that the true worth may vary based on your needs and expectations, so please consider this as a starting point for our discussion.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think the price is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understanding of its value. After careful consideration, we would like to adjust our offer to $1300000. We believe this reflects a fair compromise while still maintaining a reasonable profit margin for us. We look forward to your response.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from the product. If we can meet at this price, I'd be happy to move forward with the purchase.
